assessment.question: Which logical operator returns 'True' if both conditions are True?

What will be the result of: 
	not (True and False)?
The 'or' operator returns True if at least __________ operand is True.
'not' is a __________ operator that negates a Boolean expression.

The following evaluates to True 
	(5 > 10) or (10 > 5)
Nested if statements are not allowed in Python.

The following evaluates to True 
	(5 == 5) and (2 > 1)

The following evaluates to True 
	not (10 > 5)

What is the output of the following? 
	x = 7 
	if x < 10 and x > 5: 
		print('Pass')
